attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Voting should be made compulsory.
So that people aren't compelled to vote for someone they disapprove of, each ballot paper should have a "None of the above" option.
If "None of the above" 'wins', the election should be rerun and the rejected candidates excluded from standing again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
